DOC.brief_summary: DCAMLK1 Ca2+ - ca/modulin ( CaM ) - dependent protein kinase marker stem cell colonic crypt . Mutations within stem cell population think responsible development colorectal carcinoma study show DCAMLK1 highly express tumor . Since lung embryological development foregut , investigator speculate DCAMLK1 also upregulated lung cancer . The aim pilot study measure DCAMLK1 level blood patient suspect malignant benign lung disease , correlate DCAMKL1 level smoke status .
DOC.detailed_description: In investigator ' preliminary study DCAMKL1 antigen detect malignant tissue , also BAL fluid patient benign lung disease . This suggest DCAMKL1 expression might induce smoke benign lung disease . To examine hypothesis , investigator compare DCAMLK1 expression blood patient lung cancer control current former smoker benign lung disease . Previous work show DCAMLK1 detectable blood healthy non smoking individual . To determine whether smoke pulmonary inflammation induce DCAMLK1 expression , investigator obtain serum sample 20 control patient lung disease see Chest Clinic Oklahoma City VAMC . Smoking history obtain participant DCAMLK1 level correlate smoking status .
